access_key.Description: The access key of the HuaweiCloud to use.

agency_domain_name.Description: The name of domain who created the agency (Identity v3).

cert.Description: A client certificate to authenticate with.

cloud.Description: The endpoint of cloud provider, defaults to myhuaweicloud.com

delegated_project.Description: The name of delegated project (Identity v3).

domain_id.Description: The ID of the Domain to scope to.

domain_name.Description: The name of the Domain to scope to.

endpoints.Description: The custom endpoints used to override the default endpoint URL.

key.Description: A client private key to authenticate with.

max_retries.Description: How many times HTTP connection should be retried until giving up.

project_id.Description: The ID of the project to login with.

project_name.Description: The name of the project to login with.

region.Description: The HuaweiCloud region to connect to.

secret_key.Description: The secret key of the HuaweiCloud to use.

security_token.Description: The security token to authenticate with a temporary security credential.

tenant_id.Description: The ID of the Tenant (Identity v2) to login with.

tenant_name.Description: The name of the Tenant (Identity v2) to login with.

token.Description: Authentication token to use as an alternative to username/password.

delete_instances.Description: Whether to delete instances when they are removed from the AS group.

health_periodic_audit_time.Description: The health check period for instances, in minutes.

instances.Description: The instances id list in the as group.

lb_listener_id.Description: The system supports the binding of up to six ELB listeners, the IDs of which are separated using a comma.
